title: Footie Award Winners + Super Bowl Picks, Judgment Day - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/13
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason give their NFL Playoffs and Super Bowl Picks! Plus, coaching news and the winners are revealed for our 2021 fantasy football awards: The Footies! Subscribe for year-round fantasy football content! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 13th, 2022.
  Join our NFL Playoff Challenge at FootclanChallenge.com
  
 (05:25) - Super Bowl Picks
 (12:10) - NFL News
 (24:00) - Footie Awards
 (24:50) - Performance of the Year
 (26:30) - Fantasy Reaper’s Man of the Year
 (29:20) - Poopiest Pants Award
 (32:20) - Waiver Wire Wonder
 (33:45) - Fantasy WR of the Year
 (36:05) - Fantasy RB of the Year
 (39:20) - Fantasy TE of the Year
 (42:55) - Fantasy QB of the Year
 (44:30) - Breakout Player of the Year
 (47:35) - Rookie of the Year
 (49:50) - Comeback Player of the Year
 (51:35) - The Playoff King
 (53:35) - Steal of the Draft
 (55:20) - Nickname of the Year
 (57:50) - Show Moment of the Year
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

 AltoIRA
 Keeps
 Bespoke Post -- Code: FOOTBALLERS
  
 Support this podcast 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
